articles.author: TIMESOFINDIA.COM
articles.title: Shahabuddin's nephew shot dead in Bihar
articles.description: The attackers pumped the bullets into his chest and Yusuf died on the spot," Jha said, adding it was not yet clear what led to the murder.
articles.content:
Patna: Jailed former Rashtriya Janata Dal MP Mohammad Shahabuddin's nephew was shot dead in Bihar's Siwan district, triggering violent protests, police said on Saturday.
Mohammad Yusuf was shot dead in Pratappur village, where Shahabuddin hails from. He was … [+469 chars]

articles.title: Bihar oppn looks for suitable seat-sharing formula
articles.description: Bihar oppn looks for suitable seat-sharing formulaMeanwhile, there is still confusion over seat allocation among the left parties.
articles.content: Patna: Even as the Congress-Rashtriya Janata Dal (RJD) logjam continues over seat allocation in Bihar, some of the smaller partners in the opposition grand alliance have started asserting their position, making it even more difficult to reach a consensus on s… [+2292 chars]

articles.author: Debashish Karmakar
articles.title: Bihar government transfers 17 IAS officials, two given additional charge
articles.description: India News: PATNA: The state government on late Monday night transferred 17 IAS official while two IAS officials were given additional charge.
articles.content:
PATNA: The state government on late Monday night transferred 17 IAS official while two IAS officials were given additional charge. Bhagalpur, Koshi, Purnia, Saran and Tirhut divisions got new commissioners in the reshuffling.

articles.author: Madan Kumar
articles.title: Nitin Gadkari to inaugurate, lay stones for national highways, waterways projects worth Rs 3,381 crore in Bihar
articles.description: India News: PATNA: Union minister, Nitin Gadkari will inaugurate and lay foundation stones for national highways and waterways projects worth Rs 3,381 crore in Bi.
articles.content:
PATNA: Union minister, Nitin Gadkari will inaugurate and lay foundation stones for national highways and waterways projects worth Rs 3,381 crore in Bihar on February 11 (Monday). 
Gadkari will inaugurate and lay the foundation for projects worth Rs 366.62 cr… [+2404 chars]

articles.author: Sanjay Singh
articles.title: JDU eyes 17 seats dominated by MBCs, upper castes
articles.description: As per the agreement reached between the BJP and JDU, both of NDA’s allies will contest 17 seats each in Bihar.
articles.content:
The JDU has begun the exercise of identifying seats which it may get as its share within the NDA in Bihar.
As per the agreement reached between the BJP and JDU, both of NDA’s allies will contest 17 seats each in Bihar. Union minister Ram Vilas Paswan-headed … [+2037 chars]

articles.author: Sanjay Singh
articles.title: BJP brings quota for poor into play in Bihar
articles.description: The quota Bill is expected to address the discontent among the upper castes fuelled by the amendment Bill to restore provisions of the SC/ST Act.
articles.content:
PATNA: In the caste-ruled political battlefield of Bihar, BJP has picked up the upper caste quota as its most potent weapon to take on the mighty Yadavs.
The united upper castes, which makes about 12-15% of the electorate, has the potential to counter RJD’s … [+2915 chars]

articles.author: Sanjay Singh
articles.title: Grand alliance: Bihar seat talks to gather pace after Lok Sabha session
articles.description: The alliance comprises Rashtriya Janata Dal (RJD), Congress, RLSP, Vikassheel Insan Party (VIP) and HAM.
articles.content:
PATNA: The partners of the opposition grand alliance in Bihar are likely to sit down by the end of next week on a fresh round of discussion over seat sharing for the Lok Sabha election.
